65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (19:06): (the new charter)

65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (19:06): it also says: "Furthermore, the Web Applications Working Group deliverables must address issues of accessibility, internationalization, mobility, and security."
